mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over(order by created_At asc) rm, a.* FROM ( SELECT board_id, title, hit_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(created_At, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_At, is_deleted FROM t_board ) a WHERE a.is_deleted='N' ORDER BY rm desc
